author: realbigsean
content:
We haven't made beacon API changes, we previously were signing blobs but removed them (can add it back if we decide to go this direction)

If we add `validate_blobs_sidecar` as a gossip condition, we can rely on that to make sure blobs match commitments in the block, and we can rely on the block's signature otherwise. `validate_blobs_sidecar` takes around 4ms with 256kb blobs vs a signature verification would take under 2ms if we sign over `sha2(ssz(blob))`. I think adding signing for this might be a bit of a premature optimization if we're targeting blobs around that size
